Super amazing restaurant that we found. Don't come here expecting a cheap meal because it won't happen. However it is well worth the price and the food is absolutely amazing.   The owner is out working the tables and is a lovely gal to chat with. She's not opinionated but neither am I  :-) This is a great place come to have steak. Good steak.    Even though we were often looking for authentic Spanish food I found myself coming here entirely too much. This was the best restaurant I had on my trip to Barcelona.  Oh, If you sit outside expect to pay an extra two €50 for the pleasure.
